title: Q9 Revision G/U MC
prompt: Which of these is the <u>most</u> accurate and effective revision to the sentence?
description:
Read this sentence.

The maintenance staff are responsible for building systems during power outages and will shut off sensitive building equipment.
feedback: The sentence should read: “The maintenance staff is responsible for building systems during power outages and will shut off sensitive building equipment.” The subject “staff” might be confusing because it is a group noun. It describes a group of people. However, group nouns such as “staff,” “company,” “couple,” or “family” are typically singular. The correct verb is the singular verb “is.”
